name: WE NEED THE SUN
description:
Made for the GMTK Jam 2019

You need to reach the sun...

explore 16 randomly appearing levels

on a quest to reach the sun, racking up

scores through collecting coins... one

problem though, YOU CAN ONLY MOVE

BY JUMPING.

That means only

one method of transport and one goal

This is my first publicly available game, so I

hope you enjoy it, I may make more as I really

enjoy developing!
